original_title: Actor Tom Sizemore dies of a brain aneurysm at the age of 61
original_body_lines: Colombo (News 1st) – Actor Tom Sizemore who starred opposite Tom Hanks in 'Saving Private Ryan' has died of a brain aneurysm at the age of 61.
Some of his other roles included hits such as 'Black Hawk Down', 'Natural Born Killers', 'Devil in a Blue Dress' and 'Pearl Harbour'.

Sri Lanka are champions at Wheelchair Tennis Asia Oceania Qualification Event
Miss Sri Lanka Sandani Peiris wins 2nd Runner-Up at Top Model of The World 2023
